pageContext.title: Moderation
pageContext.contentRaw:
When the conversation is good, people stay and talk.

Quality conversation is the first step to community, and every community is unique. OpenWebOS offers a fully customizable approach to facilitating high quality, brand safe conversations powered by AI, Machine Learning, and human moderation that’s tailored to fit your audience.

Three Pillars of Effective Moderation

1

Combat Toxicity

Filter toxicity and automatically adjust controls on a per-user basis.

2

Incentivize Civility

Directly reward the positive contributors in your community.

3

Highlight Quality

Automatically surface quality contributions, create community role models.

Keep Quality
on Top

Across the OpenWeb network, our quality-first algorithms ensure that the best contributions are seen the most. The more high-quality conversation users see, the more they will want to stay, read, and register to take part.

“OpenWeb is the immunity to the toxicity in comments.”

Host a conversation that brings out the best in your community.

Before a comment is posted to the conversation, a series of safeguards kick into action to ensure that quality comes first.

Our AI- and Machine Learning technology, fueled with cutting-edge linguistic recognition partnerships, is the first line of defense against toxicity in your community.

OpenWebOS tracks behavior at the user level to build a predictive profile. With this, we tailor moderation controls to the users, allowing more or less trust based on the history of their contributions–automatically.

Your policies are paramount. With OpenWebOS, moderation is scalable and customizable. Adjust your tolerance for different behaviors to meet your site guidelines and your community’s expectations.

Your community is a valuable asset in the fight against toxicity. OpenWebOS offers your users easy ways to flag comments that they feel are out of bounds.

For any contribution that needs a closer look, OpenWeb’s staff of human moderators are your community safeguards–24/7, 365 days a year.

Quality is your key to sustainable revenue.

Effective Moderation

Proven, AI- and Machine Learning-powered moderation.

Quality Conversations

High-quality, civil discussions that attract users and create value.

Community

Increased retention, registrations, time on site, and pages per session.

Sustainability

OpenWeb provides sustainable revenue through context-relevant, high-value advertising at scale.
